patterns.error_handling: ## Error Handling | Explicit error states with user options: | - Exit with error code on validation failure: `process.exit(1)`
patterns.testing: # Testing Patterns | ## Test Framework | **Status: No automated test suite exists.** | This is a meta-prompting system consisting of Markdown prompts, not executable code. The "tests" are: | **The one JavaScript file** (`bin/install.js`) has no unit tests.
